title: What do you guys think?

embed.description: MAKE SURE TO ►SUBSCRIBE AND ►LIKE/ ►SHARE THE VIDEO, TO SEE MORE FUNNY MONTAGES! :D STAY AWESOME AND ALWAYS REMEMBER TO HAVE FUN! :)! In this video we play some LEE SIN JUNGLE games and from the highlights we made a funny montage! :) and we hope you enjoy it as much as we did making it!!!!

body:
Hey guys,

I was wondering if i can get some Constructive Criticism on my Efforts.

I really enjoy making these types of Video's.

Is there anything i should change?

Thanks for your time :)

replies.body:
hi i think your video editing skills are great :D but i think you just need to get better at the game and use quick cast lel. 
if your gameplay was better (ie. your skills) you would be a lot more popular. :D (i am not saying  i'm some mlg skt faker) :D              {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

haha hey man! thanks :D
yeah at the moment i make videos for entertainment :) putting in funny moments and such, i want to try push in ranked really soon to see how far i can get in the rankings :D﻿ im pretty sure i do use quick cast haha i just tend to hold in my skills :P
and yeah we all got to start somewhere  ^_^
